static Curvature_FundamentalForm(pnt, points, rad, tree=None)[source]¶

Curvature computation based on fundamental form

Parameters:
  • pnt – array 3x1 point of interest
  • points – pointset
  • tree – KD tree, if exists
  • rad – radius of the neighborhood
Returns:

principal curvatures
static Curvature_by3parameters(points, normals)[source]¶

Computes the curvature for each point in the point cloud according to three parameters.

Main idea: 1. Find neighbors

  1. Rotate so that the normal will be [0 0 1]

    the bi-quadratic surface coefficients \(d,e,f\) are zero and the fitting is of three parameters:

    \[z(x,y) = ax^2 + by^2 + cxy\]

  2. Second derivatives dictate the curvature

    \[\begin{split}{\bf H} = \begin{bmatrix} 2a & c \\ c & 2b \end{bmatrix}\end{split}\]
Parameters: points – the point cloud
Returns: curvature property
static Gaussian_Curvature(k1, k2)[source]¶

static Similarity_Curvature(k1, k2)[source]¶

calculates similarity curvature (E,H)

Parameters: k1,k2 – principal curvatures (k1>k2)

  values of similarity curvature (E,H)
Return rgb: RGB color for every point
